entry.title: sazzadhossainmilon/got-scraping-client: got-scraping-client is a lightweight and efficient tool for web scraping tasks using the popular Got HTTP client. It simplifies data extraction from web pages by providing a straightforward API and built-in support for handling common challenges like pagination and rate limiting.
entry.content: got-scraping-client is a lightweight and efficient tool for web scraping tasks using the popular Got HTTP client. It simplifies data extraction from web pages by providing a straightforward API and built-in support for handling common challenges like pagination and rate limiting.

entry.title: harpiats/core: Harpia Core is the foundational module of the Harpia Framework, designed exclusively for the Bun runtime. Like Express, Fastify, or Hono, it can be used independently, offering a lightweight yet powerful foundation for building modern web applications optimized for Bun.
entry.content: Harpia Core is the foundational module of the Harpia Framework, designed exclusively for the Bun runtime. Like Express, Fastify, or Hono, it can be used independently, offering a lightweight yet powerful foundation for building modern web applications optimized for Bun.

entry.title: ChandanJain009/nodejs-nano-service: A lightweight event-driven microservices package for RabbitMQ in Node.js. Enables asynchronous communication, message publishing and consuming, and scalable event-driven architecture. Perfect for distributed systems and real-time applications.
entry.content: A lightweight event-driven microservices package for RabbitMQ in Node.js. Enables asynchronous communication, message publishing and consuming, and scalable event-driven architecture. Perfect for distributed systems and real-time applications.

entry.title: dantewarhola/secure_messaging_website: Secure Chat is a real-time, end-to-end encrypted messaging app where users can create or join password-protected rooms. Built with React, Node.js, and Socket.IO, it encrypts messages client-side before sending. Lightweight, fast, and deployable for private communication.
entry.content: Secure Chat is a real-time, end-to-end encrypted messaging app where users can create or join password-protected rooms. Built with React, Node.js, and Socket.IO, it encrypts messages client-side before sending. Lightweight, fast, and deployable for private communication.

entry.title: Nexacore-Org/ByteChain-Academy: A lightweight Web3 learning platform combining bite-sized lessons (5-10 mins) with a decentralized currency knowledge hub. Features quick interactive quizzes, practical challenges, and historical data on global currencies with community contributions via DAO governance. Perfect for busy professionals seeking no-commitment crypto education.
entry.content: A lightweight Web3 learning platform combining bite-sized lessons (5-10 mins) with a decentralized currency knowledge hub. Features quick interactive quizzes, practical challenges, and historical data on global currencies with community contributions via DAO governance. Perfect for busy professionals seeking no-commitment crypto education.
